name: Cool Animals
description:
**NOTE. THIS GAME REQUIRES A JOYSTICK TO PLAY**



A versatile game that allows you to scale your own team to overcome the challenges proposed in each stage

Use the duckling when you want to slide over the water without sinking
Use Castor when you need to solve some puzzles
Use the goat when you need to break something that is blocking your way.
Use the frog when you need to bounce off walls
Use the squirrel when you need to get through tight spots
Use the cat when you need to boost yourself to jump great distances
Use the fish when you need to breathe underwater
